Trade/Device Name(s): MedApps Remote Patient Monitoring System model d-PAL
Regulation Name(s): Transmitters and Receivers, Physiological Signal, Radiofrequency
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): LifeScan OneTouch® Ultra® Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MedApps Remote Patient Monitoring System that transmits patient glucose data via wireless connection from medical devices to healthcare providers.
Indications for Use Summary: Acts as an accessory to FDA cleared devices to collect and transmit stored patient data via wireless connections from medical devices to a cellular phone (Hub) and forwards to a central server for healthcare practitioner review; not intended for automated treatment decisions, emergency calls, or substitute for professional healthcare judgment.
